criticalSuccess.message: Choose two of the following: You learn which skill that can Influence Ekundayo has the lowest DC (skipping any skills that you already know), one of Ekundayo’s personal biases, one of Ekundayo’s resistances, or one of Ekundayo’s weaknesses. you can choose the same option twice to learn two pieces of information from the same category.

success.message: Choose one of the following: You learn which skill that can Influence Ekundayo has the lowest DC (skipping any skills that you already know), one of Ekundayo’s personal biases, one of Ekundayo’s resistances, or one of Ekundayo’s weaknesses.

criticalFailure.message: Choose a piece of information to learn about, as success, but the information is incorrect. For instance, you might think Ekundayo is susceptible to flattery when actually Ekundayo is resistant to flattery.
